Posts.Content: Dec 3, 2009 07:30PM Blessed123 wrote: Hi, this is my first time posting.  I start radiation tomorrow, I am scheduled for 33 treatments.   Really nervouse about side effects, esp. since I am still experiencing a lot of muscle weakness and swollen ankles from chemo even though I am 5 wks out.  I plan on going back to work next week and am nervous about the fatigue.
Posts.Title: December 2009 Rads Group Linda_NJ BonnieSF
